charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-Defendant knowingly and intentionally distributed cocaine base ("crack"), a Schedule II controlled substance. In violation of Title 21, USC, Section 841(a)(1). (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 30 months; Supervised Release: 3 years; Special Assessment: $100.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: Defendant knowingly and intentionally did distribute cocaine base, a Schedule II controlled substance. In violation of Title 21, USC, Section 841(a)(1)
